about.info: Hola! {html} {html} I am an argentinian visual artist and illustrator devoted to unique art piece design and creation. {html} {html} I firstly got a visual communication designer degree. After that I became a plastic artist at Universidad Nacional de La Plata college. {html} In my early years as a professional I worked on graphic design, I paved the way to artistic production and editorial illustration later. I master tools within this scope and I delight on applying them in search of innovative results. {html}I have had the chance to work with great artists side by side, which allowed me to professionally grow up every time. {html} {html} Being motivated by nature, poetry, music, words as well as creativity, I feel passionate about colors, lines and forms and long for the supernatural or the unknown. I always combine this all and apply it on new projects. {html} {html} I have always wanted to share my magic. I know I found how to do it.
contact.title: For inquires about ilustration services, art commissions, buy original artwork or prints, I invite you to complete the following form, I will be contacting you shortly. Thanks!

home.invitation: Sometimes our soul takes us to look for the extraordinary. Such divine impulse might have brought you here...
home.askMe: If you have any questions or need further information about my work,
home.contactMe: please feel free to contact me
